plot: A loving couple's relationship is tested by a video camera that shows the wife having an affair with another man. Is it reality, or something else?
title: Realities of Love
plot_es: A loving couple's relationship is tested by a video camera that shows the wife having an affair with another man. Is it reality, or something else?
plot_en: A loving couple's relationship is tested by a video camera that shows the wife having an affair with another man. Is it reality, or something else?
